entry.title: 2021-07-11-rogue-film-school
entry.content:
Related, but more practical subjects, will be the art of lockpicking. Traveling on foot. The exhilaration of being shot at unsuccessfully. The athletic side of filmmaking. The creation of your own shooting permits. The neutralization of bureaucracy. Guerrilla tactics. Self reliance.

From The Rogue Film School
entry.summary: Related, but more practical subjects, will be the art of lockpicking. Traveling on foot. The exhilaration of being shot at unsuccessfully. The athletic side of filmmaking. The creation of your own shooting permits. The neutralization of bureaucracy. Guerrilla tactics. Self reliance.

entry.title: Busy Doing Nothing
entry.content: I finished reading Busy Doing Nothing, the log of the 51 days it took Rekka Bell y Devine Lu Linvega to sail from Shinoda (Japan) to Victoria (Canada). Highly recommended reading.
entry.summary: I finished reading Busy Doing Nothing, the log of the 51 days it took Rekka Bell y Devine Lu Linvega to sail from Shinoda (Japan) to Victoria (Canada). Highly recommended reading.
